item.title: Privatisation of Public Sector Banks & Banks Strike in March 2021
item.description: The Finance Minister has announced in Union Budget of India for 2021-22, that two Public Sector Banks (PSBs) will be Privatised. The policy of government in last three decades of economic reforms was to sell a part of shares in Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) including PSBs to public while retaining the controlling share in its own hands. Privatisation of PSBs is
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
